data.title: Siteground Black Friday Cyber Monday 2023: Save up to 86% OFF Web Hosting Plans
data.meta_description: Siteground Black Friday deal is a valuable opportunity for anyone looking for a new web hosting provider. Siteground is a trusted web host and a top choice for WordPress hosting. The Standard Plan costs just $1.99 per month, the GrowBig Plan costs $3.99 per month, and the GoGeek Plan costs $5.99 per month. Sign up today to avoid missing out on the Siteground Black Friday deal!
data.text:
Siteground Black Friday Deals are here! This is the best time in the year to take advantage of huge discounts for their web hosting plans.

I have never seen Siteground offer 86% OFF all their web hosting plans before so this is truly quite rare.

Siteground usually offers discounts on very long subscriptions such as their 3 Year hosting plans.

But for this year’s Black Friday sale, they are offering a massive 86% OFF for ALL their hosting plans with the 12-Month subscription too.

Startup plan from just $2.99/month! (From regular $14.99)

GrowBig plan from just $4.99/month (From regular $24.99)

GoGeek plan from just $7.99/month (From regular $39.99)

Seriously, this is such a STEAL.

If you are planning to get a fast and reliable web host or switch to a new one – get this insane deal while it lasts! The icing on top: Siteground offers FREE site migration for the GoBig and GoGeek plans.

In this post, you’ll also find my affiliate links to Siteground’s Black Friday Cyber Monday hosting deals with the discounted coupon code!

What is the Siteground Black Friday Offer in 2023?

The Siteground Black Friday sale for 2023 offers a huge discount on web hosting. Siteground shared hosting plan starts at just $1.99 per month with the current sale.

They are currently offering up to 86% off web hosting!

The regular price for the cheapest plan is $14.99 per month, but you can get it at just $1.99! Resulting in savings of about $156 per year. You can lock in the lower price NOW!

Siteground deals include savings on their three hosting plans – Startup, GrowBig, and GoGeek. All three options include savings of 84% to 86% off the standard price.

You need to pay upfront for the year. However, this is when you can lock in the lower price. Enjoy 12 months of web hosting for about the price of 2 months of the same hosting.

Key Features

I believe this year’s Black Friday Cyber Monday discount is much bigger than the previous year.

This discount applies on all three of Siteground’s web hosting plans.

Hosting plans compared: Differences

In a nutshell, each plan differs by its website hosting capabilities depending on the number of monthly visits your website has.

If your website gets more than 10,000 monthly visits, it is better to get the bigger plans such as GrowBig. This will affect how their servers can handle your site traffic.

So each hosting plan differ in:

Number of monthly visits

Web space

Websites hosted

Data transfer

Server resources

Depending on the plan that you choose, you can get 10 GB to 40 GB of web storage space. It would also affects the number of websites you can create.

If you have a small blog or online eCommerce store, the startup plan should suffice.

The average business site built with a WordPress installation uses about 1 GB of data.

Essential features

Anyway, all three hosting plans include the following key features:

Unmetered traffic

Free SSL certificate

Free CMS install

Free CDN

Free email

Managed WordPress

Unlimited databases

All three plans include free SSL certificates, CDN, email, and other common features often found with shared hosting plans.

These features make it easier to set up a website and manage everything from a single platform, including your business email and content.

Siteground web hosting also features 24/7 customer service. You can contact the help desk any time of the day or night and receive a swift response.

WordPress features

I have noticed that Siteground is particularly focused on the WordPress platform.

For those who are unfamiliar with WordPress, it is a free content management system built on MySQL databases and PHP files.

It includes access to tens of thousands of themes and plugins.

WordPress also has an easy-to-navigate user dashboard and simple website builder. Anyone can easily create, edit, and manage a website using WordPress.

The simplicity of WordPress and the variety of plugins have helped make it the most used content management system.

Over 40% of all websites currently on the Internet were built using WordPress.

WordPress-focused hosting support

Siteground’s shared hosting plans are indeed specialised for WordPress.

While other shared hosting plans allow you to easily install WordPress, a hosting plan designed specifically for the platform provides greater support.

If you experience any technical issues with your WordPress site, you can rely on the experts at Siteground to help you out.

Each plan also comes with WordPress-optimized features, such as automatic WordPress updates!

So they have really awesome useful features that make WordPress installation and optimization a breeze.

Such as free WordPress installation, smooth website transfers, managed security updates, and an intuitive client dashboard.

You can quickly launch new WordPress sites, transfer existing sites, and automate your updates.

The dashboard is easy to navigate and allows anyone to instantly start setting up a website.

Their Black Friday Cyber Monday deals are truly one of the best deals for web hosting right now. If you’re thinking of switching hosts, this is the perfect time to get in on a reliable hosting solution.

I believe their Cyber Monday discounts have been extended so there’s still time to get this limited-time offer!

If your website has outgrown shared hosting, Siteground also offers cloud hosting with dedicated servers for higher performance.

Plans and Pricing

Let’s recap again. Siteground has three web hosting plans on a huge discount right now:

Startup – 86% off

GrowBig – 84% off

GoGeek – 85% off

Each hosting plan requires you to complete an annual purchase instead of a monthly one.

However, with this Black Friday Deal, the annual cost is just a little over the standard monthly cost.

Startup plan

The Startup Plan typically costs $14.99 per month. It is intended for beginners and small businesses, as it only allows you to set up a single website. Now, you can get it at $1.99 per month!

This is really a no-brainer.

With the Siteground Black Friday Deal, you can pay $23.88 plus taxes and fees for an entire year of shared hosting, which is 86% in savings compared to the standard price.

If you have a blog or an online store, this basic plan is really an excellent web hosting solution for you to get started.

GrowBig plan

The GrowBig Plan has a standard price of $24.99 per month. The current deal allows you to get a full year for $3.99 per month, which is 84% of the standard price.

I’m currently on the GrowBig plan and it offers better performance features which has improved my site speed!

GoGeek plan

The GoGeek Plan normally costs $39.99 per month. It is the highest-tier plan and the most expensive.

With the current deal, you pay just $5.99 per month for the first year. If you are a developer or agency, the GoGeek plan would be best.

This is really a great time to get this plan if you are building websites for clients.

No matter which of the plans you choose, you receive tremendous savings.

While other web hosts offer free domain name in its packages, Siteground does not. But they do offer free migration on their GoBig and GoGeek plans.

During Black Friday, the savings on their regular prices makes it a great deal to get their annual hosting plans.

Overview of Siteground’s Hosting Plans

Siteground is a web hosting company founded in 2004. It currently provides hosting for over two million domains around the world. It is one of the most recommended hosting companies for WordPress hosting.

They have data centers across the globe to ensure optimal connectivity for websites.

Siteground has three types of hosting: shared hosting, cloud hosting, and reseller hosting.

The most common type of web hosting is shared hosting. The current Siteground Black Friday Deal is focused on their shared hosting plans. This is focused on WordPress and WooCommerce platforms.

30-day money-back guarantee

The plans are also backed by a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not happy with the service, you have 30 days to cancel and receive a full refund. After 30 days, you cancel your service but will not get a full refund.

Unlimited databases

All of Siteground’s hosting plans include unlimited databases, which is useful for WordPress sites.

WordPress uses MySQL databases to store data and dynamically generate webpages using PHP scripts.

You also get automatic updates. Siteground can automatically update your WordPress installation and plugins whenever a new release is available. That’s pretty awesome, isn’t it?

Keeping your WordPress installation and plugins updated is essential for keeping your site secure and avoiding any issues that may impact the user experience or load times.

For example, an outdated plugin may stop working properly or cause issues with elements on the pages.

The bottom line is that Siteground optimizes and simplifies how you manage a WordPress site.

Here is a closer look at each hosting plan.

Startup Plan features

The Startup Plan is the most affordable of the Siteground hosting plans. Some of the main features of the Startup Plan include:

1 website

10 GB of storage

10,000 visits per month

Free WP installation and migrator

Free SSL

Daily backups

Free email and CDN

Unlimited databases

Managed WordPress

30-day money-back guarantee

These features are fairly standard for a basic WordPress hosting plan. You can create a single WordPress site. You also get 10 GB of storage, which is more than enough for one website.

You can receive about 10,000 monthly visits before Siteground starts limiting bandwidth. Luckily, the typical small business website is unlikely to exceed 10,000 visitors in a month.

Migrating a WordPress site to Siteground is also easy. You can use the free WP Migrator to automate the migration process and avoid any errors that could result in downtime for your website.

GrowBig Plan features

The GrowBig Plan is made for those that want to grow their business online. You can build more sites and receive more traffic compared to the Standard Plan.

You get everything provided with the Standard Plan, along with the following essential features:

Unlimited websites

20 GB of storage

100,000 visits per month

On-demand backup copies

30% faster PHP

Staging

The GrowBig Plan offers a better value for those that expect to receive more than 10,000 visitors per month. You can also build unlimited websites, which is not an option on the Standard Plan.

So, if you are a marketing agency building websites for clients, you’d want to get the GrowBig plan.

Security and Backups

The GrowBig Plan also allows you to create up to five on-demand backups. You can use a backup to instantly restore your website if you need to undo a recent change.

You need to purchase the on-demand backups individually when using the Startup Plan.

Faster loading times

Siteground uses a different method for implementing PHP on the GrowBig and GoGeek Plans. If fast speed is important for your business, consider getting the GrowBig and GoGeek.

Compared to the Startup Plan, you can enjoy up to 30% faster PHP responses.

As WordPress is mostly built using PHP, a faster PHP framework results in faster loading times for your website.

Staging

Siteground also adds a helpful staging feature. The staging feature allows you to create a copy of your website for testing.

You can test code or changes before implementing them on your live site.

I personally use the staging feature when implementing technical changes on my own website such as the core web vitals optimizations.

GoGeek Plan features

The GoGeek Plan includes everything that you get with the GoBig Plan, along with the following features:

40 GB of storage

400,000 visits per month

White label clients

Free private DNS

Priority support

The GoGeek Plan comes with ample storage for just about any type of online endeavor. You can also build unlimited websites and receive up to 400,000 visits per month.

The GoGeek Plan is designed for entrepreneurs and businesses that expect significant traffic or require more storage.

Large eCommerce sites and entertainment sites may also require the extra features included with the GoGeek Plan.

White-label

You also get white-label support with the GoGeek Plan. White labeling allows you to give your clients access to a custom set of tools without the Siteground branding.

You can use this reseller hosting feature to offer white-label hosting and generate income.

Free private DNS

The GoGeek Plan also comes with a free private DNS. You can set up a custom domain name for use with your nameservers.

The free private DNS can help create a more consistent image when selling white-label hosting.

Priority support

GoGeek Plan customers receive priority support.

The customer service department prioritizes your support tickets when something goes wrong.

You receive help from the most experienced customer support agents, so you can resolve your issue faster.

Reasons for Getting Siteground Black Friday Offer

Along with the features discussed, Siteground offers many reasons to sign up for hosting during the Black Friday sale, including:

One-click app installer

Free SSL certificate

Cloudflare app in cPanel

Free backups

Site speed

Customer support

The Siteground Black Friday Deal is also incredibly affordable. You can get up to 86% off the standard price of their web hosting services for an entire year.

One Click App Installer

Siteground includes a one-click app installer. Some of the apps available for instant installation include:

WordPress

Joomla

Drupal

OpenCart

PrestaShop

WooCommerce

And more.

You do not need to download files separately, upload them to your hosting account, and configure the application.

Siteground takes care of everything for you. You can install some of the most used web-based applications in a single click.

Free SSL Certificate

You get a free SSL certificate with your Siteground account.

Adding an SSL certificate to a website has become standard practice. It enhances the security of your site and helps promote confidence in the legitimacy of your website.

An SSL certificate is also essential for eCommerce sites and any website where visitors need to supply sensitive information.

A secure sockets layer (SSL) certificate is a digital certificate that provides authentication of your website’s identity and allows for encrypted connections.

Cloudflare App in cPanel

Siteground gives you access to the Cloudflare App via the cPanel.

You can easily manage your content instead of needing to log in to a separate service.

You also receive free CDN storage to help you maintain a faster WordPress site.

Your images, video, and the cached content from your site are delivered from the CDN data center closest to the visitor, which helps speed up loading times.

Free Backups

Siteground plans include free backups. You get free daily backups of your entire WordPress site, allowing you to restore the website if an update or change causes it to malfunction.

The Startup Plan includes a single backup that Siteground rewrites each day. The GrowBig and GoGeek Plans store up to 30 days’ worth of backups before replacing the oldest one.

Site Speed

Siteground offers superior site speed compared to many other hosting providers.

The hosting plans are built specifically for WordPress. You can also take advantage of faster PHP implementation with the GrowBig and GoGeek Plans. These advanced features can be quite beneficial for bigger sites.

Customer Support

Siteground customer support is available 24/7. Customer support is one of the advantages of choosing Siteground, as the company responds to technical issues quickly, especially if you choose the GoGeek Plan.

In the end, the Siteground Black Friday deal is a valuable opportunity for anyone looking for a new web hosting provider. They are a trusted web host and a top choice for web hosting. This is the best time to secure a great deal for your website.

You can get the best savings on the price of Siteground’s web hosting services during this BFCM season. So don’t hestitate!
